description:
Easily redesign your home in a variety of stunning styles using advanced AI technology.​​ Home AI brings the expertise of an interior designer right into your pocket!

Simply take or upload a photo of the room and space you wish to redesign, choose a style, and receive instant interior design alternatives with unparalleled detail and accuracy. 

Whether you aim to modernize your living room, add a touch of elegance to your bedroom, or completely revamp your kitchen, Home AI has got you covered.
Whether you're an existing homeowner looking for a fresh new look, or a real estate agent staging the perfect property, our app is your ideal design partner. Home AI is here to serve as your personal AI interior design assistant, transforming your space in real time and providing personalized interior designs tailored specifically for your space.

【Effortless Interior Design at Your Fingertips】

Instant Room Makeover: Take a picture of any room in your house, and Home AI's advanced AI technology will instantly generate stunning interior design concepts tailored to your space. Witness the magic unfold as your vision comes to life before your eyes, with every detail thoughtfully optimized.

A World of Interior Design Styles: Unleash your inner decorator with our extensive library of over 10 diverse interior design styles. From the sleek minimalism of modern interior design to the calming serenity of a zen aesthetic, Home AI caters to every taste. Experiment with various styles, mix and match elements, and discover the perfect look that reflects your unique personality.

AI-Powered Recommendations that Go Beyond Style: Home AI doesn't just suggest a new look; it provides insightful recommendations on furniture, decor, and color schemes that perfectly complement your chosen style. Create a harmonious and cohesive space that feels truly lived-in.

【More Than Just Visualization:】

Save and Share Your Concepts: Capture and store your favorite interior design concepts for future reference. Share your transformed spaces with friends, family, or even professional interior designers to gather valuable feedback and refine your vision. Collaborate effortlessly and bring your design dreams to life.

Find Inspiration from Endless Possibilities: Home AI acts as your personal interior design muse, offering endless inspiration to spark your creativity. Explore different concepts and experiment with various styles to find the perfect balance that reflects your unique taste and elevates your space.

【Home AI is the ultimate tool for anyone who wants to:】

Effortlessly visualize interior design ideas and see their dream home come to life
Explore a vast library of interior design styles and discover their perfect aesthetic
Refresh a single room or plan a complete home makeover with ease
Collaborate with friends, family, and professionals to create a personalized space
Spark their creativity and find endless interior design inspiration

Download Home AI today and unlock a world of interior design possibilities! Reimagine your space, redefine your style, and create the home of your dreams with the power of cutting-edge AI technology.

By using the app, you confirm that you acknowledge and accept our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use:
Privacy Policy: https://homeinterior.ai/privacy
Terms of Service: https://homeinterior.ai/terms

Do you have a question for us?
info@homeinterior.ai

Transform your living space with DecAI™, where designing your dream home is as simple as snapping a photo by AI.

► AI Interior Design & Decor
Just upload an image of your room, choose the type of space and the style you want. Our advanced AI technology will analyze your room's dimensions and characteristics, then generate a stunning interior design plan catered to your taste. From modern chic to rustic warmth, our AI interior designer presents you with a visualization of furniture arrangements, color palettes, and decorative accents that bring your personal touch to life. 

► AI Garden Design
Upload a snapshot of your yard, patio or rooftop, and watch as our advanced AI crafts personalized garden designs in seconds—no green thumb needed. From tropical oases to cottage-core charm, our technology tailors layouts with seasonal blooms, winding pathways, and cozy seating zones, matching your style and space dimensions. Visualize drought-resistant plantings, modern hardscaping, or vibrant flower beds before breaking ground, and unlock endless possibilities for backyard makeovers, balcony retreats, or front-yard curb appeal. 

► AI Exterior Design & Renovation
Transform your home's exterior and garden with AI-powered design tools, visualize your dream space. Get rid of design constraints with a multitude of novel ideas for your home's exterior design. Simply upload a picture of your house, choose your preferred style, and the AI will provide you with a personalized design plan.

► Transform Any Item with Replace
Unlimited Creativity with Seamless Replacement – Tired of your current furniture or decorations? The Replace feature lets you erase unwanted items and input what you’d like to see instead, generating a new image to breathe new life into your home.


► Discover New Walls
Revamp your room's look with "New Walls." Swap textures and colors with ease, visualizing the perfect wall finish without lifting a paintbrush. Our AI ensures every suggestion aligns with your vision.

► Preview Your Flooring Choices
Why wait for the perfect flooring when you can see it instantly? Our "Instantly Install New Flooring" feature lets you preview a wide selection of flooring options, from hardwood to tile, right on your device.

► Explore Room Design Ideas
Looking for a little inspiration? "AI Interior Design" is your go-to source for a plethora of room design ideas.

Transform your iPhone into a personal masterpiece with Wallpics, the ultimate destination for stunning live wallpapers, DIY wallpaper creations, charging animations, pfp icons, matching wallpaper sets, and true 4K quality backgrounds. Whether you’re looking to refresh your lockscreen or craft a cohesive home-and-lockscreen theme, Wallpics delivers everything you need to make your device truly yours.

Endless Live Wallpapers & 4K Quality Backgrounds
• Dive into a vast library of dynamic live wallpapers in breathtaking 4K quality—fluid animations that bring motion and depth to your lockscreen and home screen.
• Browse categories from abstract art and nature scenes to futuristic cityscapes, all rendered in ultra-high definition for crisp, vibrant visuals.
• Enjoy smooth playback and perfect compatibility with iOS’s Live Photo lockscreen feature—your screen has never looked this alive.

DIY Wallpaper Studio
• Unleash your creativity with Wallpics’s intuitive wallpaper maker. Mix and match patterns, colors, and textures to design your own custom backgrounds in minutes.
• Add text, overlays, and stickers—or start with our premium templates to craft a signature look.
• Export your creations in both standard and 4K resolutions, ready to set as your lockscreen, home screen, or share with friends.

Charging Animations & Dynamic Effects
• Impress every time you plug in: choose from a gallery of charging animations that light up around your battery icon—so fun, you’ll look forward to low battery!
• From neon pulses and sparkles to liquid fills and energy ripples, our power-on effects are fully customizable and optimized for iOS.

Premium PFP Icons & Matching Wallpaper Sets
• Personalize your social profiles with a curated collection of pfp icons—stylized avatars, minimalist logos, and neon glyphs that pop on any background.
• Coordinate your entire device aesthetic with matching wallpaper bundles—lockscreen and home screen designs that complement each other perfectly.
• Keep your theme cohesive across apps by exporting both backgrounds and pfp icons at once.

Features at a Glance

Live Wallpapers: Animated lockscreen backgrounds & home screen motion

DIY Wallpaper: Custom background studio with templates, text & stickers

Charging Animations: Dynamic power-on effects for every charge

PFP Icons: Profile picture avatars in multiple styles and resolutions

Matching Wallpaper Sets: Coordinated lockscreen + home screen bundles

4K Quality: Ultra-HD backgrounds and exports

Ready to elevate your iPhone experience? Download Wallpics now and unlock a universe of live wallpapers, DIY creations, charging animations, pfp icons, matching wallpaper, and 4K quality backgrounds—tailored just for you!

HOME PLANNER: THE ULTIMATE HOUSE DESIGN AND RENOVATION APP

Bring your dream space to life with Home Planner, the ultimate app for design and renovation enthusiasts. Featuring advanced tools like 3D modeling with home design AI, a built-in 3D scanner, and precise measure functionality, this house design app is perfect for both professionals and DIY enthusiasts. Whether you’re reimagining a single room or planning a complete overhaul, Home Planner offers everything you need to design, customize, and visualize your space effortlessly.

Transform Your Vision with Home Design AI and 3D Modeling
Craft stunning designs using Home Planner’s intuitive 3D modeling tools. Create detailed layouts in both 2D and 3D, allowing you to visualize every aspect of your project. The app’s advanced 3D modeling capabilities and top-notch home design AI enable you to experiment with different furniture arrangements and decor styles. Let your vision come to life with accuracy and ease.

Scan Your Space with the 3D Scanner
Home Planner’s built-in 3D scanner lets you capture your space in seconds. By scanning any room, you can instantly generate accurate dimensions and layouts. The 3D scanner ensures every detail of your space is accounted for, eliminating guesswork and saving you time. 

Measure with Unmatched Precision
Avoid costly design errors with Home Planner’s precise measure tools. The integrated digital tape measure captures exact dimensions of walls, furniture, and spaces, ensuring every element fits perfectly. Whether you’re measuring for a new sofa or planning a full renovation, Home Planner ensures functional and aesthetic designs.

Seamlessly Combine 3D Modeling and Scanning
Combine 3D modeling with the 3D scanner to create highly detailed and accurate designs with our home design AI. Scan your space, then use the house design app’s 3D modeling tools to explore various layouts and decor styles. Home Planner ensures your projects are as precise as they are creative.

House Design App that Customizes Every Detail of Your Space
Personalize your designs with unparalleled flexibility. Experiment with materials, colors, and finishes to craft a space that reflects your style. With 3D modeling and home design AI, you can visualize every change in real-time, while the 3D scanner and measure tools provide the accuracy of your floor plans.

Immersive Visuals with Realistic Renders
Showcase your designs with lifelike renders and detailed visualizations. Home Planner’s 3D modeling features produce stunning results, complete with realistic lighting and textures. Share your designs with clients, collaborators, or friends to get feedback and refine your concepts.

House Design App that Streamlines Your Workflow with Powerful Tools
Home Planner’s comprehensive toolset - including 3D modeling, top-notch home design AI, a 3D scanner, and precise digital measure tape - makes it easy to plan and execute projects efficiently. From scanning a room to generating layouts and creating detailed designs.

Collaborate and Share Your Designs
Share your projects with ease using Home Planner’s collaborative features. Gather feedback and refine your ideas effortlessly. With Home Planner and our home design AI, turning your vision into reality is a collaborative and enjoyable experience.

Unlock Premium Features of Advanced House Design App
Upgrade to premium and explore the full potential of Home Planner:

— Access pre-designed layouts for quick inspiration
— Create unlimited projects for large-scale designs
— Unlock an extensive catalog of decor and furniture items
— Generate high-quality renders and immersive visuals
— Utilize advanced 3D modeling AI for home design, 3D scanner, and measure tools

Home Planner combines cutting-edge technology with user-friendly design. With advanced 3D modeling AI for home design, an integrated 3D scanner, and precise digital measure tape, this house design app has everything you need to create stunning spaces.

ibis Paint X is a popular and versatile drawing app downloaded more than 460 million times in total as a series, which provides over 47000 brushes, over 27000 materials, over 2100 fonts,84 filters, 46 screentones, 27 blending modes, recording drawing processes, stroke stabilization feature, various ruler features such as radial line rulers or symmetry rulers, clipping mask features.

*Concept/Features
- A Highly functional and professional features surpassing that of desktop drawing apps.
- Smooth and comfortable drawing experience realized by OpenGL technology.
- Recording your drawing process as a video.
- SNS feature where you can learn drawing techniques from other users' drawing process videos.

*Feedback from users
We receive many good reputations from users.
- I could have never assumed that I can draw such a beautiful drawings on smartphones!
- Easiest to use among all drawing apps!
- I have learned how to draw digital drawings without Mac or PC!

*Features
ibis Paint has high functionality as a drawing app along with features of sharing drawing processes with other users.

[Brush Features]
- Smooth drawing at up to 120 fps.
- Over 47000 kinds of brushes including dip pens, felt tip pens, digital pens, air brushes, fan brushes, flat brushes, pencils, oil brushes, charcoal brushes, crayons and stamps.

[Layer Features]
- You can add layers as many as you need with no limit.
- Layer parameters that can be set to each layers individually such as layer opacity, alpha blending, adding, subtracting, and multiplying.
- A handy clipping feature for clipping images, etc.
- Various layer commands such as layer duplication, import from the photo library, horizontal inversion, vertical inversion, layer rotation, layer moving, and zooming in/out.
- A feature for setting layer names to distinguish different layers.

[Manga Features]
- Advanced text tool function featuring Vertical, Horizontal, Stroke, Font select, and Multiple text functions.
